TextView.android:text:
• Download BitTorrent Sync from Google Play on your smartphone
 • Install BitTorrent client on your computer
 • Install BitTorrent sync on your computer
 • In the preferences of BitTorrent client, go to:
 	» Directories » Location of .torrents » Automatically load .torrents from » [YOUR BTSYNC DIRECTORY]
 • Check the 'delete loaded .torrents' and 'enable search in subdirectories'
 • Open Sinema and go to settings, in General » Transfer Method choose BitTorrent Sync
 • Return to the main activity, a screen will appear
 • Press and hold the directory you have chosen for BTS
 • You can always change this by clearing the BitTorrent Sync Path in the settings activity
 • Once you start your computer, make sure BTS is running on your phone, and BT is running on your computer
